1.content:
one day a boy named lee aged 10 was play in the forest behind his home he was exploring looking for anything special when he came across an amulet it was golden with a dragon on the front he placed it in his scale and carried on walking playing with the wooded sword he was carrying he went though a bush and tripped on something on the ground as he investigated he pulled it out of the bush is was a dragon scale just the same size as him and decided to drag it back to his small house outside of the city he soon reached his front door placing the scale on the porch he entered his house and fell asleep.

the following morning lee woke up to find his garden full of more scales the same colour and size as the one he found yesterday lee got his sword and shield and entered the yard he looked around and saw no dragon keeping his shield close he ventured forward still looking he noticed something in the dirt it was a dragon footprint he examined it and found the print belonged to a female dragon he looked around but saw no sign the dragoness was in the proximity of his home he walked back into his home and found his book on dragons and looked for which dragon has been flying around.

he looked in the book and found in was a battle class dragon with the power too protect or destroy but was always female as he studied he started to catch flashes of shadows roaming around his home picking up his sword he charged out side and saw a shadow on the ground he turned and saw the dragon on his roof as he drew his sword the dragon breathed in and launched a fire ball exploding on impact knocking lee out the dragon flew down and picked him up in its claws and flew back to its layer in the mountain on arrival the dragon placed lee in the corner an started a fire.

a few hours past and lee regained conciseness looking around he didn't see his house he only saw a cave and a fire he looked around then his head started to hurt "oh my head hurts what happened?" then he heard wings flapping and saw a pure white dragon land in front of him as he looked he felt for his sword but it wasn't with him as the dragon approached him he started to panic but noticed the dragon was sitting on the ground watching him he looked and remembered this was a female as he was about to speak the dragon opened its mouth and said " hi my name alice nice to meet you".

lee could only stutter as alice asked "are you okay you seem stressed" then he passed out wrapping her tail around him she pulled him closer and snuggled with him after a couple of hours he came around and noticed her tail around him trying to struggle free the tail only tightened around him as he did alice woke up and said "ah your awake do you want to ask me something?" lee looked and saw alice meant no harm so asked "why did you kidnap me?" alice looked confused and said " I didn't kidnap you found my scale" lee looked in confusion alice looked at him and decided to explain.

alice loosened her tail grip on lee and sat in front of him and explained "you see when dragons reach maturity they leave a single scale at the foot of their home and who or what finds it and returns it their home is chosen to take as their lover." lee remembered and said "if that is your tradition I will respect it I'm yours" alice walked to lee and kissed him as she was only a little taller then him after a few seconds alice finished her kiss lee fell impressed.

but what happens next

12.content:
alice and lee were talking about the lives they had before they meet or well kidnapped alice and lee laughed at the situation they were both in alice then said "stay here I'm going to find some food for us" lee waved and alice flew away staying in the cave lee stayed near the fire as he waited for alice to return he soon noticed more scales around the cave and decided to build a fort out of them after a couple of hours of work lee finished and crawled inside and fell asleep soon alice returned to the cave and saw her scales in the weird formation she looked around and saw lee asleep she reached in and pulled lee out without waking him.

alice opened her mouth and place lee inside her mouth and lay on the floor as she closed it and wrapped her tounge around him lee rolled around and nearly fell down her throat alice wrapped her tounge even tighter around lee they both slept though the night the next morning lee woke up to see himself in his mates mouth he walked to the front of her mouth alice in instinct started to swallow lee was at the back of the throat he shouted "alice don't swallow" alice woke as she swallowed lee fell for a few seconds the alice gaged forcing lee back up her throat and out her mouth lee sighed and alice looked sorry.

lee turned to alice and said "don't worry accidents happen" smiling alice leaned in and smooched lee soon they were using tounge kissing each other as their tounge were locked alice ears perked she pulled out and said "lee I need you to hide in that structure you built now" lee ran and hide in the small fort and lay flat alice guarded the entrance snarling soon a shadow appeared on the wall alice went on the defective then a voice said "hello alice you here?" alice calmed and said "yes ember I'm here" lee listened and spied though a gap on the wall soon ember entered she was the same size as alice and was a mix of black and orange.

alice approached ember and they laughed ember said "how have you been has someone taken your scale yet?" alice blushed and ember noticed and smiled and said "well where is the lucky dragon?" alice said nothing ember got impeccant and said "where is he alice your mate cant be to far away" ember raised her claw and lee broke the fort and charged in front of alice as ember spotted him she realised this was alice mate and laughed and said "really a human alice come on his food not a mate" ember grabbed lee and opened her mouth and started to put him inside but then alice grabbed lee with her tail.

alice pulled lee back and growled and said "this human is my mate and he will remain save as long as I live" kissing him in front of ember she soon noticed that alice was not lying and sat on the floor and said " lee I'm sorry I never thought a dragon and a human would be a couple so please forgive me" lee smiled and said "its alright ember you didn't know" they all sat in a circle and talked about anything then embers stomach growled alice got the cow she caught the night before and breathed fire on it and cooked it in a few seconds dividing it equally they all enjoyed it and ember looked at lee.

after finishing alice took the skeleton outside ember approached lee and gave him a scale lee looked confused as ember explained "well you see their are two ways of finding a mate one you know the second give a scale to the mate you want" lee looked at the scale and accepted it alice returned and saw the exchange she was happy that ember had found a mate and that it was lee but also not happy has she would have to live with them ember then wrapped her tail round lee as did alice but what happens next
